sense.def:
A bar
je kraj, kjer kupujemo in pijemo alkoholne pijače.

seg.quote: Norris was drinking at a bar in San Francisco.
He called for the menu and ordered in the bar while they were finishing their drinks.

sense.def:
A bar
je tudi podolgovata miza, na kateri strežejo z alkoholnimi pijačami.

A bar
je tudi dolg, raven, trd kos kovine.

seg.quote: We beat on the bars of our cells.

sense.def:
A bar of something
je približno pravokoten kos nečesa, na primer mila.

To bar someone from going somewhere or doing something
pomeni nekomu preprečiti, da bi nekam odšel ali nekaj storil.

seg.quote: I turned to go. Stryker barred my way.
...restrictions barring the use of US-supplied weapons.

sense.def:
Besedo
bar
lahko uporabimo v pomenu "except". Na primer:
all the work bar the washing
pomeni vse delo z izjemo pranja;

V glasbi je
a bar
eden od kratkih, enako dolgih delov skladbe.
